resources.string: We observed a significant increase in your water consumption. From an average consumption of %1$s cu.m. in the previous months, it increased to %2$s cu.m. this month. You may want to check your internal plumbing and waterline for underground leaks and/or unauthorized tappings. For further inquiries regarding the matter, please call Maynilad Hotline 1626. Thank you.

Our records show that you have a total amount due of Php %1$s. We strongly advise you to pay your overdue and/or installment due amount on or before %2$s to avoid the inconvenience of a disconnected water service.Please disregard this notice if payment has been made. Thank you.

resources.string: Please examine your bill carefully. If no complaint is made within 60 days of receipt, the bill is considered true and correct.
THIS INVOICE/RECEIPT SHALL BE VALID FOR FIVE (5) YEARS
FROM THE DATE OF THE PERMIT TO USE.
